com.epoch.mechanisms

Class MechValidFlows

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.mechanisms.MechValidFlows
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChemConstants, MechSynthConstants, FormatConstants, MechConstants, MechErrorConstants

    class MechValidFlows
extends Object
implements MechConstants
    Analyzes the validity of a mechanism.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkCyclic()
      Checks the cyclic portion of the mechanism for validity, throwing an error if the mechanism is invalid.
      (package private) void checkFlowsValid()
      For all stages, are their contents composed of starting materials and products of electron flows of their previous stages??
      private void checkForBranchedStage()
      Finds a branched-off stage whose contents were copied into the current one, and sees if it contains a compound that is neither permissible starting material nor product of electron-flow arrows.
      private void checkForInitiator()
      Does the initiator appear as a starting material or intermediate in the propagation?
      private void checkForInitiatorProds()
      Does any portion of the initiator appear as a starting material or intermediate in the propagation?
      private void checkForOffendingCpds()
      Checks whether a stage contains compounds that are neither products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage nor legitimate starting materials.

      Checks whether a stage contains products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage.

      Checks whether a stage contains products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage.

      Checks the linear portion of the mechanism for validity, throwing an error if the mechanism is invalid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MechValidFlows

        MechValidFlows(Mechanism mechanism,
               Molecule startMolecule,
               int leniency)
        throws MechFormatException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        mechanism - the parsed mechanism whose validity is being assessed
        startMolecule - permissible starting materials for this mechanism as a single Molecule
        leniency - sets resonance leniency for starting materials, stereochemistry leniency for all compounds
        Throws:
        MechFormatException - if the mechanism has cyclic part but can't find first stage of cyclic part

    • Method Detail

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

      • checkFlowsValid

        void checkFlowsValid()
              throws MechError,
                     SearchException
        For all stages, are their contents composed of starting materials and products of electron flows of their previous stages??
        Throws:
        MechError - if the electron-flow arrows do not flow logically
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared

      • checkLinear

        private void checkLinear()
                  throws MechError,
                         SearchException
        Checks the linear portion of the mechanism for validity, throwing an error if the mechanism is invalid.
        Throws:
        MechError - if the electron-flow arrows do not flow logically
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared

      • checkCyclic

        private void checkCyclic()
                  throws MechError,
                         SearchException
        Checks the cyclic portion of the mechanism for validity, throwing an error if the mechanism is invalid.
        Throws:
        MechError - if the electron-flow arrows do not flow logically
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared

      • checkForPrevStageProds

        private void checkForPrevStageProds()
                             throws SearchException,
                                    MechError
        Checks whether a stage contains products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage. If stage is first cyclic, the previous stage is the last cyclic stage, not the last linear stage.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared
        MechError - if the stage contains no products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage

      • checkForPrevStageProds

        private void checkForPrevStageProds(boolean lastStageIsPrev)
                             throws SearchException,
                                    MechError
        Checks whether a stage contains products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage. If stage is first cyclic, the previous stage is the last cyclic stage, not the last linear stage.
        Parameters:
        lastStageIsPrev - if true, the previous stage is the last stage of the mechanism
        Throws:
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared
        MechError - if the stage contains no products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage

      • checkForOffendingCpds

        private void checkForOffendingCpds()
                            throws SearchException,
                                   MechError
        Checks whether a stage contains compounds that are neither products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage nor legitimate starting materials. If stage is first cyclic, the previous stage is the last cyclic stage, not the last linear stage.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared
        MechError - if the stage contains no products of electron-flow arrows of the previous stage

      • checkForBranchedStage

        private void checkForBranchedStage()
                            throws SearchException,
                                   MechError
        Finds a branched-off stage whose contents were copied into the current one, and sees if it contains a compound that is neither permissible starting material nor product of electron-flow arrows.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared
        MechError - if branched-off stage contains a compound that is neither permissible starting material nor product of electron-flow arrows

      • initiationOK

        void initiationOK()
           throws MechError,
                  SearchException
        Is there an initiation, and, if so, does the initiator or any portion of the initiator appear as a starting material or intermediate in the propagation?
        Throws:
        MechError - if the electron-flow arrows do not flow logically
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared

      • checkForInitiator

        private void checkForInitiator()
                        throws MechError,
                               SearchException
        Does the initiator appear as a starting material or intermediate in the propagation?
        Throws:
        MechError - if the electron-flow arrows do not flow logically
        SearchException - if compounds cannot be compared

      • setFromInitiator

        private void setFromInitiator(Molecule initiatorMol,
                              MechStage stage)
        Finds the atoms in the stage molecule that correspond to the atoms in the initiator molecule, and sets their fromInitiator property to true.
        Parameters:
        initiatorMol - an initiator molecule
        stage - the stage containing the original atoms

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the fromInitiator property of any atom in the molecule is true

      • getBestFormat

        private String getBestFormat(Molecule[] mols)
        Determines whether it's best to convert the molecules into SMILES or SMARTS format.
        Parameters:
        mols - array of molecules
        Returns:
        SMARTS if any of the molecules have a query bond, SMARTS otherwise

        Parameters:
        products - an array of molecules
        Returns:
        the modified molecules
